resources.string: 페이스 같은 건 잊고 그냥 달려보세요. NRC와 함께\n러닝을 완료한 후에는 여기에서 러닝 거리, 통계, 달성\n기록을 확인할 수 있습니다.
NRC training plans give you weekly\n coaching and guidance to help you\n reach your goals.

You will get the guidance, motivation and
 inspiration to run better, faster, further,
 recover better and have more fun. The goal is
 to not only get you stronger and faster,
 but also smarter. We believe that becoming a
 better athlete involves becoming a better
 coach.
Guidance on running, recovery, strength\n training and mindset to prepare you for the\n journey of a lifetime.

This training plan is built to help the best
 version of you reach the starting line of your
 Marathon. The programme is a maximum of
 18 weeks long. We recommend that you begin
 this programme with no less than 12 weeks to
 go before your race date.

This plan is built for all runners. We offer up to
 5 runs each week. We recommend that you
 do at least 3 runs per week and have worked
 up to a consistent running routine prior to
 starting. For every easy and Long Run, you
 can go shorter or longer based on your
 fitness. Check in with your body and make
 adjustments as needed. Remember, you are
 becoming your own best coach as you
 progress through this plan.
This week you will begin your journey with a\n series of runs and light workouts that\n introduce you to the training plan.
Connect your mind and\n body with mindfulness runs.\n Audio in English.
